To do this, I will build a simple series circuit with the sodium chloride included. The circuit will be: Battery -> Red Wire -> Blue Light Bulb -> Yellow Wire -> Sodium Chloride -> Battery. If the light bulb turns on when the circuit is complete, it means the sodium chloride is conductive.
